mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_VIEWS, B.CATEGORY, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_VIEWS, B.CATEGORY, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , CATEGORY , TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as CREATED_DATE , BOARD_VIEWS FROM TB_BOARD WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}

SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_VIEWS, B.CATEGORY, B.FILENAME, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TB_BOARD B JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_SEQ = M.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE B.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

SELECT B.BOARD_SEQ, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(B.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as CREATED_DATE, B.BOARD_VIEWS, B.CATEGORY, B.MEMBER_SEQ, B.FILENAME, C.COMMENT_SEQ, C.CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT, C.CREATED_DATE AS COMMENT_CREATED_DATE, C.MEMBER_SEQ AS COMMENT_MEMBER_SEQ FROM TB_BOARD B LEFT JOIN TB_COMMENT C ON B.BOARD_SEQ = C.BOARD_SEQ WHERE B.BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}
SELECT * FROM TB_BOARD ORDER BY board_seq DESC LIMIT 4
